faqData.question: How long does it take to clean a sofa or curtains?
faqData.answer: Generally, cleaning a 2-3 seater sofa or 1-2 sets of curtains takes about 1-2 hours, depending on the fabric type and the severity of stains.

faqData.question: How long does it take to dry after cleaning?
faqData.answer: Your sofa or curtains will be dry and ready to use within 3-4 hours after cleaning. We recommend using a fan or air conditioner to speed up the drying process.

faqData.question: Are the cleaning solutions safe for children and pets?
faqData.answer: Absolutely. We use high-quality, nature-derived cleaning products that are free from harmful chemicals, ensuring safety for your entire family and pets.
